resources.string: We need your location to find people near you.

Welcome to Fantasy Dating!

We believe in fantasies being real, and we’re so happy to have you here!

Let’s get started by selecting your sex.

I am a Girl, Boy, or Person.
Show me <tap data="who">%1$s</tap> in <tap data="where">%2$s</tap> between the ages of <tap data="ageMin">%3$s</tap> and <tap data="ageMax">%4$s</tap>
Not in Austin? Don\'t worry, keep Fantasy Dating installed and we\'ll let you know when we launch in more areas. <tap data="ok">Okay then</tap>.

Choose a photo. We review all photos for authenticity and photo quality. We recommend hiring a pro photographer.

We allow nudity so long as it is artistic or cute. Read our Photography Guidebook.

Choose from your photo, or close

Choose a photo, or reposition this one.

We review all photos for authenticity and photo quality. We recommend hiring a pro photographer.

We allow nudity so long as it is artistic or cute. Read our Photography Guidebook.

Choose from your photo, or close
Report %1$s as <tap data="report:confirm:fake">Fake</tap> or <tap data="report:confirm:other">Something else</tap>

Your account will die and you\'ll need to set up a new account to use Fantasy Dating again.

Do you want this?

Yes, delete my account

No way, get me outta here
Love is our ingredient. Yes, <tap data="love">I love %1$s</tap>
Tap here to start writing your sexual fantasy

Photography Guidebook

1.   You should be the highlight of the photograph.
2.   Use a pro camera and interesting location.
3.   Be artistic! Pose in a new way. Expressive yourself fully.
4.   Your photo should be recent (captured within the last twelve months.)

Close Guidebook
<tap data="profile">Complete your profile</tap> to let %1$s discover you
Your profile is currently in review
You and %1$s love each other. <tap data="message">Talk with %2$s</tap>
Your profile is complete. <tap data="submit">Submit for review</tap>
